channel.title: Help smithing!
channel.description: im useing torvapkz a 317 pi and im haveing problems with the smithing. every time you use a bar on the furnance you get dced and come back online with the bar you smithing how do you stop the dc and how would i make it so when you use the bar on the anvil you smith coins thank you im new at codeing
